name: Econ Adventures - Luke Egan
description:
You're a dumb ruler that can't do anything right, luckily Luke is here to help you out a bit. Chose from four different endings while you try to help your kingdom out by making choices. 

How to get the different endings:

This is for people who are looking to see the different endings after plaything through once.

1 of 4(Good Ending): Walk down hall 1 every time.

2 of 4(Uh Oh Ending): Walk down hall 2 every time.

3 of 4(WHAT DID YOU DO Ending): Walk down hall 3 every time.

4 of 4(Neutral Ending): Don't walk down the same hall more than twice.
